Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it seems that you've completed
all the town restoration work!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
How remarkable!
You impress me more and more all the
time!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So I've come up with a new town
restoration assignment for you!
<PAGE>
I must say, it's a bit more ambitious
than the last one, <MYNAME>, but I know
you can do it!
<PAGE>
Will you take the assignment?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, you will? Splendid!
You are the hope of our town!
Please do your very best!
<PAGE>
Here is the new town restoration
project.
Please read it carefully.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I'll be going now.
I leave the matter in your capable
hands!

A new town restoration plan...
I wonder what's in it? I'll check the
<RED>menu</RED> to find out!
